title: S&P 500 Analyst Moves: COP - Nasdaq.com
text: The latest tally of analyst opinions from the major brokerage houses shows that among the components of the S&P 500 index, ConocoPhillips is now the #82 analyst pick, moving up by 1 spot.    makeArticleAd();  This rank is formed by averaging the analyst opinions for each component from each broker, and then ranking the 500 components by those average opinion values.      Looking at the stock price movement year to date, ConocoPhillips is lower by about 17.7%.        VIDEO: S&P 500 Analyst Moves: COP
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
